comment: Truth be told, the white farmers have probably done much more for the Zulu people than the government over there. So to them, it's probably a no brainer. I've seen farmers up in Michigan sell food to the community by leaving a donation box out. Seeing that blew my mind. Where I live the blacks would steal the food and the box of money!
